SELECT sell.record_id, sell.third_order_id, czb_user.user_account, sell.petrol_num, sell.turnover_amount, sell.transaction_area, sell.transaction_time, cw.commodity_title FROM czb_petrol_sales_records_without_card AS sell LEFT JOIN czb_user ON czb_user.user_id = sell.buyer_id LEFT JOIN czb_commodity_without_card AS cw ON cw.commodity_id = sell.commodity_id
and czb_user.user_account like concat('%',#{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sell.petrol_num like concat('%',#{petrolNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sell.transaction_area like concat('%',#{transactionArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and cw.commodity_title like concat('%',#{commodityTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sell.transaction_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and sell.transaction_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
